about_the_game:
More levels，monsters，bosses and player skills.


《Starway:BaRaider VR -Free Trial》 is a free trial version of《Starway:BaRaider》.

In 2639 AD, unknown machine lifeforms invaded the human space colony planet. They are entrenched in energy mining areas and have taken away large amounts of energy debris. Losing the mining area means that humans' spacecrafts cannot get any energy supplies. All crew members are at risk. As one the 'Starway' soilders, you are required to defeat the invaders on colony planets and retake the diggings.

Game Features

  • Various of super-giant mechanical monsters are attacking. Players have to survive from numerous of bullets.

  • Teleporting in all directions to avoid being attacked.

  • Multiple choices for skill system building in this version: Bullet Time, Floating mine, RPG, Laser Gun etc..

    Rich trial levels

    • Vanquishing huge planet mechanical boss.
    • Wiping out the space base of enemies.
    • Surviving from the mechanical frenzy within limited time.
    • Duel with the flexible tentacle monster.
    • etc..

movies.name: 弹幕强袭_宣传视频_英文_10.21

name: Starway: BaRaider VR - Free Trial

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / RX 580 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

publishers: 广州雷氪沉浸技术有限公司
short_description: This is a VR action shooting game themed in science fiction. Mechanical frenzy is coming! Players have to teleport to survive from thousands of bullets.
